title: Technology-Enhanced Creative Mathematics Project Design: Centered on Vygotsky’s Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Utilizing collaborative tools (Google Docs, Jamboard, etc.) in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones

learning_goals: Apply Vygotsky’s Zone of Proximal Development (ZPD) concept to improve math problem-solving strategies via peer feedback (achieve ≥80% proficiency)
Complete a creative math modeling project using smartphone-based collaboration tools (submit one artifact per team)
Apply technology-integrated instructional design principles to analyze and document knowledge construction processes with peer learners (submit individual reflective journals)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
